increase() - Method in class it.polimi.se2018.model.Die
Increase the Die's value.
IncrementDieValue - Class in it.polimi.se2018.model.events
This class is used to encapsulate the data needed to perform the action of incrementing or decrementing a drafted Die's value allowed by the ToolCard 'Grozing Pliers'.
IncrementDieValue(int, boolean, View, String, String) - Constructor for class it.polimi.se2018.model.events.IncrementDieValue
Constructor of the class.
